mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pb_docs ( title, description, projectId, postedDate, sceneList, previewImage, category ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{postedDate}, #{sceneList}, #{previewImage}, #{category} )
mapper.select: select * from pb_docs where accountId = #{ accountId } and title like CONCAT('%', #{ query } ,'%')
select * from pb_docs where accountId = #{ accountId } and description like CONCAT('%', #{ query } ,'%')
select * from pb_docs where accountId != #{ accountId } and description like CONCAT('%', #{ query } ,'%')
select * from pb_docs where accountId != #{ accountId } and description like CONCAT('%', #{ query } ,'%')
select * from pb_docs where _id in (select parent from pb_tree where child = #{ docId })
select * from pb_docs where _id in ( select child from pb_tree where parent = #{ docId } )
